docs.snippet: Mr. Parker’s institute will try to spur collaboration among six academic centers in developing ways to unleash patients’ immune systems to fight cancer.

headline.print_headline: Facebook and Napster Pioneer to Push Innovation in Cancer Treatment
headline.main: Sean Parker, a Facebook and Napster Pioneer, to Start Cancer Immunotherapy Effort

docs.abstract: Sean Parker announces he will give $250 million to Parker Institute for Cancer Immunotherapy, initiative that will seek to foster collaboration between six leading acadmic centers in order to come up with methods for using patients' immune systems to fight cancer.
